summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5325 for the improvement of Aurora Avenue, from Board Street to Lynn Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 61828 as amended in Sections 1 and 2 by Ordinance 62194, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
